‘ trial Park, Fort Armistead Park, and the

150 acres of green space, play equipment,

In addition the City owns the 100 acre Fort
Smallwood Park on the harbor in Anne
Arundel County.

There are several public boat launch-
ing facilities on the harbor: one is at
Central Avenue, two are in Broening Park
just west of the South Baltimore General
Hospital, and two at Fort Armistead.

ties on the harbor for the recreational -
boater. Since the 1970s, however, there has
been a steady increase in marinas, piers,
